pkgmetadata.longdescription: Diffusion Model of Conflict (DMC) in Reaction Time Tasks // DMC model simulation detailed in Ulrich, R., Schroeter, H., Leuthold, H., Birngruber, T. (2015). Automatic and controlled stimulus processing in conflict tasks: Superimposed diffusion processes and delta functions. Cognitive Psychology, 78, 148-174. Ulrich et al. (2015) doi:10.1016/j.cogpsych.2015.02.005.
